scripts.build: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=rhel-openssl-3.0.x DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_SITE1 prisma generate && pnpm --filter @my-project/site1 prisma && pnpm --filter @my-project/site2 prisma && tsc && esbuild src/functions/trpc.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/functions/trpc.js && rm -f dist/functions/*.d.ts dist/functions/*.map && mkdir -p dist/functions/prisma/client && if [ -f node_modules/.prisma/client/libquery_engine-rhel-openssl-3.0.x.so.node ]; then cp node_modules/.prisma/client/libquery_engine-rhel-openssl-3.0.x.so.node dist/functions/prisma/client/; else echo "Warning: Prisma query engine binary not found, relying on Netlify build"; fi'
